news.title: Chuck Mangione, Smooth Jazz Standard-Bearer Who Wrote “Feels So Good,” Dies at 84
news.summary: The jazz musician toured with Art Blakely, contributed songs to two Olympic Games, and held a recurring role as himself on King of the Hill
